website_summaries.verdict: A great whitening product if you're able to get past the taste.
pros: Leaves your mouth feeling clean and freshens breath
cons: Some users find the taste unpleasant

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: I really notice a difference when i use this. Highly recommend along with biannual dental appointments
customer_reviews.author: Amber B

customer_reviews.title: Never going back to Crest Rinse. This is great stuff.
customer_reviews.text: Dentist and oral surgeon recommended this to me for dental implants/prosthetics. Keeps teeth whitened and the peroxide is enamel safe. Use the High Impact toothpaste with it twice per day, and after stain causing coffee, tea and food, for best results. Never going back to Crest Rinse.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen M.

customer_reviews.title: It does whiten my teeth
customer_reviews.text: I use this two or three times a day after brushing. Over time I can see that it is whiting my teeth and so it is worthwhile for me to buy this. I drink about three cups of coffee a day and one cola and they contribute to the yellowing of my teeth and this is helping me to reverse that. I use this with the Colgate optic white toothpaste.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J Burton

customer_reviews.title: Pearly whites
customer_reviews.text: As a dental health care professional I stand behind Colgate Optic white whitening mouthwash to better improve and achieve an at home whiter smile
customer_reviews.author: Clark

customer_reviews.title: Tastes awful, hope it does it’s job
customer_reviews.text: Makes me gag and I’m not exaggerating. It doesn’t taste like peppermint. Did we get a bad batch? Hopping it does it’s job. We could not return items like this. Lesson learned buy a smaller bottle for trial.
customer_reviews.author: Manny and Elise

customer_reviews.title: Really works!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. They used to carry it at Walmart but discontinued it. I was glad to find it at Amazon. I have professional bleaching trays but find they take too long and make my teeth sensitive. This works faster and better, tastes great and freshens your breath too. I use once daily in the morning and my teeth are so white. I do keep it in my mouth more like 10min. rather than the 60 seconds they say.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too early to tell if works
customer_reviews.text: I will have to see if it works! So far I don’t see a difference in the whitening of my teeth, but I will be patient
customer_reviews.author: Ayn Rand

customer_reviews.title: Just what the Hygeinist ordered
customer_reviews.text: I threw away my old mouthwash and ordered this one because dental hygienist told me to. I have been using this for awhile now and I like it. I am impressed with how fast this came and how well packaged it was.
customer_reviews.author: amazon client

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is great
customer_reviews.text: Been using this mouthwash with the toothpaste for about 4 days and already I notice a big difference. It really works. I will keep using it.
customer_reviews.author: Heifenkekfe

customer_reviews.title: Kills mouth sores & Germs!
customer_reviews.text: We didn’t buy this for the whitening, although that’s a plus! We bought it for the sanitary reason of 2% Hydrogen Peroxide that is so healthy during this pandemic for killing germs!
customer_reviews.author: LinnieM

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Not a good product overall. Bad flavor. Too foamy. Giving it away.
customer_reviews.author: Shoppah617

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: Use this with Colgate optic white and you got yourself some serious whitening power right on the spot.
customer_reviews.author: Enrique

customer_reviews.title: So good
customer_reviews.text: Love it it tastes great and leaves my mouth feeling fresh and clean I am enjoying this very much thank you 🙏🏼
customer_reviews.author: Noemi Pajares

customer_reviews.title: Love how big the bottles are.  Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Great value for my money. The package was surprising huge bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Tastes fine but I notice no whitening at all after two months.
customer_reviews.author: Doubletake

customer_reviews.title: Meets its promise
customer_reviews.text: This toothpaste and mouth wash is better then other whitening products I’ve tried. Jerry
customer_reviews.author: jerry c. weil

customer_reviews.title: It’s too harsh for my teeth
customer_reviews.text: This product is making my teeth too sensitive What can I do to return them
customer_reviews.author: Margaret UterMalcolm

customer_reviews.title: A simple way to improve your smile
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, cologate hasn’t let me down yet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: I love optic white. People compliment me on my smile always
customer_reviews.author: c_sker

customer_reviews.title: White and clean
customer_reviews.text: Not only feel clean I know by the foaming teeth are super clean.
customer_reviews.author: Cubana Barbie

customer_reviews.title: Good to have a healthy mouth!
customer_reviews.text: Clean those sparkling teeth & keep the gum healthy too.
customer_reviews.author: Joy Keezer

customer_reviews.title: Really whitens teeth
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product I buy it on a regular basis. It whitens & brightens teeth.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Why not sell fresh product?
customer_reviews.text: Product is very close to expiry date and by the time I use the last bottle it will have expired. I should have received fresh product.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Never Again
customer_reviews.text: Horrible aftertaste. I had to throw it away. More harm than good. 🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮
customer_reviews.author: Daryle Bryant

customer_reviews.title: A starkly touching, personal story.
customer_reviews.text: It is stories like this that help laypeople to understand the reach of systemic racism.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Otte

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied with this mouthwash.
customer_reviews.text: Have used this product for years and feel that it keeps my teeth white.
customer_reviews.author: Gail M

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: I like a good fresh rinse. This fits the bill plus does help to whiten your teeth, especially in between the teeth. I noticed results right away and my teeth were already in good shape. I use this with the newest Optic White toothpaste, and I am so pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Joie

customer_reviews.title: Best Mouthwash
customer_reviews.text: This is the best mouthwash for freshening your breath and whitening your teeth. Swish for a solid minute, gargle before you spit, and don't rinse with water for 2 to 3 minutes. That's what I do and it is a bit time consuming but it is the only mouthwash I have noticed whiten my teeth and keep my breath fresh for longer. Also a little goes a long way too, just fill to the line provided! No it doesn't taste amazing, but that it because Colgate decided to make mouthwash that worked rather than tasted good. Tilt your head forward while swishing to avoid some of the contact with your tongue!
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Great mouthwash
customer_reviews.text: I drink a lot of coffee and tea, and I use this mouthwash in conjunction with a mild whitening toothpaste to offset the stains and it works. So far, no stains and brownness and yellowness is at a minimum. I experienced no gum or tooth sensitivity that can happen with a lot of whitening products. It's gentle and effective and is a part of my long-term routine.
customer_reviews.author: Betty

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I just started using this a week and a half ago along with the toothpaste. Both were recommended to me by my daughters,who both use it and have liked it so well.I can already see a difference in how white my teeth are. I really like both products,but like someone else mentioned the taste of the mouthwash is not great. I can live with the taste since it seems to be working so well.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good product
customer_reviews.text: This product was recommended by my dentist. I haven’t had any sensitivity from use. Pretty decent taste. Modest whitening or at least maintaining the whitening the dentist did.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Son, he says it was very thick and he did not like it, he diluted it with some mouthwash and it worked well then and kept his teeth looking white
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Colgate Optic White Deal
customer_reviews.text: Huge trio of granddaughter-loved mouthwash! She's tickled pink! Says they are hard to find. Thanks Amazon and seller!
customer_reviews.author: Dwranny

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Does not whiten as claimed even if using accompanying toothpaste. Save your money.
customer_reviews.author: Coal

customer_reviews.title: Caused sores and red streaks in my mouth
customer_reviews.text: I used this twice and developed sores and red streaks on my gums. Glad it works for some, but definitely did not work for me.
customer_reviews.author: KY Woman

customer_reviews.title: It seems to work!
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Seems to work whitening my teeth. Cons: Very Strong Taste!
customer_reviews.author: Robert M

customer_reviews.title: Mouth feels very clean.
customer_reviews.text: It's very foamy from the hydrogen peroxide, but other than that, it's a good product and works well in conjunction with the Colgate Optic White toothpaste.
customer_reviews.author: chall99

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: Doesnt taste awful although it hasnt made my teeth shiny white..it seems to have helped a bit
customer_reviews.author: canchaser1982

customer_reviews.title: Whiter smile
customer_reviews.text: I definitely see a difference in my teeth shade when using this product consistently
customer_reviews.author: chynnjms

customer_reviews.title: Not very minty
customer_reviews.text: I think it works but it does not taste like minty mouth wash.
customer_reviews.author: MSS

customer_reviews.title: but it is the worst possible taste to put in your mouth
customer_reviews.text: My wife swears by this product, but it is the worst possible taste to put in your mouth. Truly gross!
customer_reviews.author: Joel

product_meta.title: Colgate Optic White Whitening Mouthwash, Fresh Mint - 946mL, 32 fluid ounce (3 Pack)
product_meta.description: Size:Pack of 3| Style:Fresh MintColgate Optic White High Impact White whitening mouthwash contains 2% hydrogen peroxide to effectively whiten teeth by removing surface stains. This alcohol-free mouthwash (does not contain ethanol) is available in a Sparkling Fresh Mint flavor to freshen breath while whitening teeth and contains Whiteseal technology to help prevent future stains. The mouthwash's action reaches hard-to-brush places, helping to whiten teeth and freshen breath. For an extra white smile, use after brushing with Colgate Optic White toothbrushes and toothpastes.
feature_bullets: High Impact White teeth whitening mouthwash
Effective and enamel safe 2% hydrogen peroxide whitening formula, an ingredient recommended by dentists for dental whitening
Actively whitens teeth and Whiteseal technology helps to prevent future stains
Kills bad breath germs and bacteria
Alcohol free mouthwash that does not contain ethanol, so there's no burn; fluoride free mouthwash formula
Pack of 3 bottles with 32 fluid ounces in each; a total of 96 fluid ounces

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
